title: Chisong Wei Long
synopsis: The heroic young Chisong of Penglai Xianguan was punished by his master Lu Yi and left Songshan to travel around the world. On the way home, Akamatsu accidentally discovered the conspiracy of the Demon Cult and was persecuted by the organization. The Demon Cult harassed the people, spread rumors, and dispatched four monsters "wind, fire, thunder, and electricity" to the common people. After several hardships, Akamatsu joined the princess Diaoman and the general to declare war on the Demon Cult. The three worked together to finally eradicate the Demon Cult and protect their homeland. The people can live and work in peace...(translated from douban)
